data.lyric:
[ti:Take Me Home For Christmas]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Take Me Home For Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take Me Home For Christmas - Dan + Shay
[00:05.12]Lyrics by：Dan Smyers/Andy Albert/Jordan Reynolds/Jordan Schmidt/Mitchell Tenpenny
[00:10.24]Baby when December comes
[00:12.82]When it's gettin' cold outside
[00:15.76]And your bags are packed
[00:17.95]I don't wanna say goodbye
[00:20.61]When I see the trees light up
[00:23.17]When they hang the mistletoe
[00:26.05]And I'm by the fire
[00:28.28]I don't wanna be alone
[00:30.30]Baby won't you take me home for Christmas
[00:34.32]Show me 'round your town
[00:36.72]Take me where you used to watch the snow come down
[00:41.79]Honor your traditions
[00:44.12]I wanna know 'em all
[00:47.05]You'll check every box off of my list
[00:50.68]If you take me home for Christmas
[00:54.13]Take me home yeah
[00:56.87]Take me home
[00:59.32]Take me home
[01:01.67]I wanna spend the night before
[01:04.41]Drinkin' with your high school friends
[01:07.27]'Round the neighborhood
[01:09.21]We can do a little caroling
[01:12.26]Watchin' Santa fly
[01:14.75]Across a Christmas moon
[01:17.36]Don't need gifts this year
[01:20.54]If I got you
[01:21.89]Baby won't you take me home for Christmas
[01:25.68]Show me 'round your town
[01:28.26]Take me where you used to watch the snow come down
[01:33.40]Honor your traditions
[01:35.93]I wanna know 'em all
[01:38.62]You'll check every box off of my list
[01:42.21]If you take me home for Christmas
[01:55.33]Wanna be by your side
[01:57.66]When you open your eyes
[01:59.69]And say "Baby it's Christmas"
[02:03.62]Yes I do
[02:08.34]Baby won't you take me home for Christmas
[02:12.16]Show me 'round your town
[02:14.71]Take me where you used to watch the snow come down
[02:18.80]Snow come down
[02:20.24]Honor your traditions
[02:21.49]La-da-da-da-da
[02:22.27]I wanna know 'em all
[02:23.85]Let me see I wanna know 'em all
[02:25.35]You'll check every box off of my list
[02:28.64]If you take me home for Christmas
[02:30.47]Home for Christmas
[02:32.25]Take me home
[02:33.96]Oh yeah babe
[02:34.98]Take me home
[02:36.24]Take me home
[02:37.54]Take me home
[02:38.95]Hey
[02:42.73]Take me home
[02:45.26]Take me home
[02:47.71]Take me home
[02:52.91]Take me home
[02:55.45]Take me home
[02:58.08]Take me home
[03:03.18]Take me home
[03:05.77]Take me home
[03:08.51]Take me home
[03:09.08]Oh won't you take me home for Christmas
data.trans:
[ti:Take Me Home For Christmas]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Take Me Home For Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.12]//
[00:10.24]宝贝 当十二月到来时
[00:12.82]当天气变得寒冷时
[00:15.76]你的行李收拾好之后
[00:17.95]我不想说再见
[00:20.61]当我看到圣诞树亮起来时
[00:23.17]当他们悬挂槲寄生时
[00:26.05]而我在火堆旁
[00:28.28]我不想独自一人
[00:30.30]宝贝 你能否带我回家过圣诞
[00:34.32]带我转转你的小城
[00:36.72]带我去你以前看下雪的地方
[00:41.79]尊重你们的传统
[00:44.12]我想知道全部
[00:47.05]你会实现我的所有愿望
[00:50.68]如果你带我回家过圣诞
[00:54.13]带我回家
[00:56.87]带我回家
[00:59.32]带我回家
[01:01.67]我想在你家过夜
[01:04.41]然后和你高中的朋友喝酒
[01:07.27]在街坊四邻间转转
[01:09.21]我们可以唱唱圣诞颂歌
[01:12.26]看圣诞老人飞过
[01:14.75]圣诞时节的月亮
[01:17.36]今年不需要礼物
[01:20.54]只要有你就够了
[01:21.89]宝贝 你能否带我回家过圣诞
[01:25.68]带我转转你的小城
[01:28.26]带我去你以前看下雪的地方
[01:33.40]尊重你们的传统
[01:35.93]我想知道全部
[01:38.62]你会实现我的所有愿望
[01:42.21]如果你带我回家过圣诞
[01:55.33]想要在你身边
[01:57.66]当你睁开双眼
[01:59.69]对我说 宝贝 圣诞节到了
[02:03.62]我真的希望这样
[02:08.34]宝贝 你能否带我回家过圣诞
[02:12.16]带我转转你的小城
[02:14.71]带我去你以前看下雪的地方
[02:18.80]雪花落下
[02:20.24]尊重你们的传统
[02:21.49]//
[02:22.27]我想知道全部
[02:23.85]让我看看 我想知道全部
[02:25.35]你会实现我的所有愿望
[02:28.64]如果你带我回家过圣诞
[02:30.47]回家过圣诞
[02:32.25]带我回家
[02:33.96]宝贝
[02:34.98]带我回家
[02:36.24]带我回家
[02:37.54]带我回家
[02:38.95]//
[02:42.73]带我回家
[02:45.26]带我回家
[02:47.71]带我回家
[02:52.91]带我回家
[02:55.45]带我回家
[02:58.08]带我回家
[03:03.18]带我回家
[03:05.77]带我回家
[03:08.51]带我回家
[03:09.08]你能不能带我回家过圣诞
